articles.title: Timor-Leste's Ramos-Horta makes pitch for stability ahead of election - amp.rnz.co.nz
articles.description: The frontrunner in Timor-Leste's presidential election, independence figure and Nobel laureate Jose Ramos-Horta, has said he hopes to restore political stability to Asia's youngest democracy, as the nation prepares to head to the polls.

articles.title: Football: Lifetime bans on former Lion K. Kannan and ex-ref lifted after over 26 years - The Star Online
articles.description: SINGAPORE (The Straits Times/Asia News Network): The Football Association of Singapore (FAS) on Friday (March 18) announced it has lifted lifetime bans on former national player K. Kannan and referee Thiru Rajamanickam.

articles.title: Kanye West suspended from Instagram for 24 hours on policy violation - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The 44-year-old rapper's account was in violation of the platform's policies on "hate speech and bullying and harassment".
